title: How we automated our operation
description: Real automations we've implemented to save time, generate leads, and improve scheduling — all inside our own operation.

prospecting.title: Automated Prospecting
prospecting.description: Finds, filters, and sends qualified opportunities every day — with zero manual effort.

scheduling.title: Integrated Scheduling
scheduling.description: Combines replies, bookings, and communication channels in one place with automatic sync and notifications.

note: If we use it to scale our own agency, it’s because it works.
